attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has been reported that the BBC is planning to replace the Blue Peter garden with a virtual garden when the show is moved to Manchester. We call on the BBC to ensure that a REAL garden must be found and used as part of Blue Peter.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
